sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: The &poldek; is the packages management utility. Its basic features are similar to every modern package updater like apt-get -- program takes information about packages from package repositories (aka sources) and allows package installation, upgrading and removal.
Package dependencies are automatically handled, so if you need to install a package which requires other packages to be installed, poldek downloads and installs all the required packages by itself.
